title: After Canada, US truckers decided to start their own 'convoys'. What are they protesting?
description: First it was Canada's Freedom Convoy. Now the People's Convoy is bringing a trucker-led protest to the US, and they're on their way to Washington, DC.
content:
• As Canadian protesters shut down a border crossing over vaccine mandates, some American truckers took note.
  • Now, several groups are planning their own 'convoys' to Washington, D.C., tâ€¦ [+6483 chars]
